techmeme.title: AWS partners with the Australian government to build a secure cloud data system for top secret information; the government will invest $1.3B over 10 years (Ben Westcott/Bloomberg)

An investigation details how online gambling giants Flutter and Entain employ practices in the US that they dropped in the UK after admitting risks to UK users (Tom Bergin/Reuters)
